concepts.name: transformer
concepts.description: A library providing thousands of pretrained models for natural language processing, computer vision, and audio tasks.

concepts.name: pretrained models
concepts.description: Machine learning models that have been trained on large datasets.

concepts.name: natural language processing (nlp)
concepts.description: A field of AI focused on analyzing, understanding, and generating human language data.

concepts.name: computer vision
concepts.description: A field of AI focused on analyzing and understanding digital images and videos.

concepts.name: audio processing
concepts.description: A field focused on analyzing and understanding audio signals like speech and music.

concepts.name: transfer learning
concepts.description: A technique of using a pretrained model as a starting point for a new task.

concepts.name: sequence-to-sequence model
concepts.description: A type of model that takes a sequence as input and generates another sequence as output.

concepts.name: text generation
concepts.description: The task of generating human-readable text using language models.

concepts.name: instruction following
concepts.description: A paradigm where language models follow instructions to perform tasks.

concepts.name: function calling
concepts.description: Allowing language models to call external functions or APIs.

concepts.name: fill-in-the-middle (fim)
concepts.description: A technique for in-filling missing parts of text using language models.

concepts.name: scikit-learn
concepts.description: A Python module for machine learning built on top of SciPy and distributed under the 3-Clause BSD license.

concepts.name: python
concepts.description: A high-level programming language widely used for machine learning and data analysis.

concepts.name: scipy
concepts.description: A Python library for scientific and technical computing, providing many user-friendly and efficient numerical routines.

concepts.name: joblib
concepts.description: A Python library for lightweight pipelining and parallel computing.

concepts.name: threadpoolctl
concepts.description: A Python library for controlling thread pools in NumPy and SciPy.

concepts.name: matplotlib
concepts.description: A Python library for creating static, animated, and interactive visualizations in Python.

concepts.name: scikit-image
concepts.description: A collection of algorithms for image processing in Python.

concepts.name: pandas
concepts.description: A Python library for data manipulation and analysis, providing data structures and data analysis tools.

concepts.name: seaborn
concepts.description: A Python data visualization library based on matplotlib, providing a high-level interface for drawing attractive statistical graphics.

concepts.name: plotly
concepts.description: A Python library for creating interactive, web-based visualizations.

concepts.name: llama
concepts.description: A family of large language models developed by Meta AI Research.

concepts.name: model weights
concepts.description: The parameters of a trained machine learning model.

concepts.name: tokenizer
concepts.description: A component that converts text into numerical token representations for input to a language model.

concepts.name: inference
concepts.description: The process of using a trained model to generate predictions or outputs.

concepts.name: fine-tuning
concepts.description: The process of further training a pre-trained model on a specific task or dataset.

concepts.name: chat completion
concepts.description: A task where a language model generates responses in a conversational context.

concepts.name: text completion
concepts.description: A task where a language model generates text continuations given a prompt.

concepts.name: model parallelism
concepts.description: A technique to distribute a large model across multiple devices or processes.

concepts.name: mistral tokenizer
concepts.description: A custom tokenizer used by Mistral models.

concepts.name: pytorch
concepts.description: A deep learning library used for building and training models.

concepts.name: tensor
concepts.description: Multi-dimensional array data structure that can reside on CPU or GPU memory.

concepts.name: gpu acceleration
concepts.description: Utilizing GPU hardware to significantly speed up tensor computations.

concepts.name: deep neural network
concepts.description: Artificial neural networks with multiple layers for machine learning tasks.

concepts.name: autograd
concepts.description: Automatic differentiation system for computing gradients used in training neural networks.

concepts.name: numpy
concepts.description: Python library for scientific computing with support for multi-dimensional arrays.

concepts.name: cuda
concepts.description: Parallel computing platform and API model created by NVIDIA for general computing on GPUs.

concepts.name: cudnn
concepts.description: GPU-accelerated library of primitives for deep neural networks by NVIDIA.

concepts.name: tensorflow
concepts.description: A deep learning library used for building and training models.

concepts.name: machine learning
concepts.description: The study of algorithms and statistical models that enable systems to perform specific tasks effectively without using explicit instructions.

concepts.name: neural network
concepts.description: A computational model inspired by biological neural networks, used in machine learning for tasks like computer vision and natural language processing.

concepts.name: python api
concepts.description: An application programming interface for using TensorFlow in the Python programming language.

concepts.name: c++ api
concepts.description: An application programming interface for using TensorFlow in the C++ programming language.

concepts.name: gpu support
concepts.description: The ability to leverage graphics processing units (GPUs) to accelerate machine learning computations.

concepts.name: docker container
concepts.description: A lightweight, standalone executable package that includes the TensorFlow environment and all its dependencies.

concepts.name: jax
concepts.description: A library for high-performance machine learning research.

concepts.name: deep learning
concepts.description: A subfield of machine learning that uses artificial neural networks to learn from data.

concepts.name: keras
concepts.description: A high-level neural networks API, used for building and training deep learning models.

concepts.name: natural language processing
concepts.description: A field of AI that deals with analyzing, understanding and generating human language data.

concepts.name: time series forecasting
concepts.description: A technique for predicting future values based on previously observed values over time.

concepts.name: recommender systems
concepts.description: AI systems that guide users in a personalized way to interesting or useful objects.

concepts.name: openvino
concepts.description: An AI inference engine for optimizing deep learning models on Intel hardware.

concepts.name: novel view synthesis
concepts.description: Generating new viewpoints of a scene or object from a single or few input images.

concepts.name: diffusion model
concepts.description: A type of generative model that learns to reverse a diffusion process to generate data.

concepts.name: depth estimation
concepts.description: Predicting the depth or 3D structure of a scene from 2D image(s).

concepts.name: 3d reconstruction
concepts.description: Creating 3D models or representations from 2D image data.

concepts.name: image warping
concepts.description: Transforming an image based on a mapping between source and destination coordinates.

concepts.name: point cloud
concepts.description: A set of data points in 3D space representing the geometry of an object or scene.

concepts.name: language model
concepts.description: A statistical model that learns patterns from text data to generate human-like language.

concepts.name: self-correction
concepts.description: The ability of a language model to revise and improve its own outputs.

concepts.name: iterative fine-tuning
concepts.description: A process of repeatedly fine-tuning a model on its own generated outputs to improve performance.

concepts.name: self-taught self-correction (stasc)
concepts.description: An algorithm that enables language models to learn self-correction through iterative fine-tuning on self-generated data.

concepts.name: small language model (slm)
concepts.description: A language model with relatively fewer parameters compared to large language models.
